THE CREW WENT TO TRACK 2 AND MOVED THREE UNITS TO SOUTH END AND THEN CAME BACK TO MOVE TWO OTHER UNITS TO THE SOUTH END TO MAKE ROOM FOR THEIR SIX UNITS. WHEN THEY GOT ON THE SET OF TWO DEAD UNITS ON THE NORTH END OF TRACK 2 THEY STARTED TO ROLL. THERE WAS A HANDBRAKE ON THE NORTH END UNIT BUT CREW SAID THE SOUTH UNIT DID NOT HAVE ONE. 96006-d-10-07-96-SCXF.Narrative: ENGINEER NOTED A TRUCK MOVING AT HIGHWAY SPEED, ESTIMATED 55 TO 60 MPH, APPROACHING THE CROSSING FROM HIS RIGHT, NORTHBOUND ON S.R. 78. HE NOTED WHITE SMOKE BEGAN TO COME OFF THE REAR TRAILER TIRES, THEN BLACK SMOKE CAME OUT OF THE TRUCK'S EXHAUSO STACK. ENGINEER REALIZED THE TRUCK WASN'T GOING TO STOP, AND IN HIS JUDGMENT, HAD NO CHANCE OF AVOIDING A COLLISION ON THE CROSSING. HE THEREFORE MADE AN EMERGENCY APPLICATION OF THE TRAIN AIR BRAKES ABOUT 100 FEET BEFORE IMPACT. THE TRACTOR PASSED INOFRONT OF ENGINE 9016 MOVING ABOUT 40 TO 50 MPH AND ACCELERATING. THE ENGINE IMPACTED THE TRAILER BEHIND THE REAR DUALS ON THE LEFT SIDE. THE REAR OF THE TRAILER SWUNG TO THE EAST IMPACTING A CONCRETEPOLE USED TO SUPPORT ELECTRICAL HIGH TENSION LINES FOC GLADES ELECTRIC COOP. THE REAR DUALS CAME OFFTHE TRAILER AGAINST THE POLE. THE POSITIVE RESULTS OF THE DRUG TEST PERFORMED IN ACCORDANCE WITH FRA REASONABLE CAUSE DID NOT REPRESENT EMPLOYEE HUMAN FACTOR. THE ACCIDENT WAS CAUSED BY THE HIGHWAY VEHICLE NOT RESPONDING TO THE FLASHING CROSSING SIGNALS. THE CONDUCTOR WAS FOUND POSITIVE WITH DRUGSANN AT THE TIME OF INCIDENT, HE DID NOT HAVE CONTROL OF THE TRAIN.NoneNoneNone

G3024-d-10-22-96-WC.Narrative: WC TRAIN - T218-21 - WAS TRAVELING EASTWARD OVER THE INTERLOCKING AT 16TH & CLARK STREET AT 30.1 MPHON IC MAIN LINE TRACK WHEN TTWX 928843 DERAILED THE EAST SET OF TRUCKS. THIS WAS DUE TO AN IMPROPERTRACK PROFILE/ALIGNMENT. THE POINT WHERE THE WHEELS WENT OFF IS IN A FROG, WHICH IS LOCATED IN A DIAMOND WHICH IS IN A CURVE. COMING INTO THIS AREA IN AN EASTWARD DIRECTION, THE TRAIN IS DESCENDING OFF THE AIRLINE BRIDGE AND THROUGH A SERIES OF "S" CURVES. ONCE THE HEAD END OF THE TRAIN CROSSES THIS DIAMOND, IT AGAIN CURVES TO THE LEFT AND STARTS6UP AN ASCENDING GRADE WHICH THEN CURVES TO THE RIGHT. ONCE CAR TTWX 982843 DERAILED, THE CAR CONTINUED ALONG WITH THE EAST TRUCKS ON THE GROUND UNTILIT HIT THE CROSSOVER AT 39TH STREET. THE TRUCKS THEN CAUSED DAMAGE TO THE TRACK WHICH IN TURN CAUSEDTHH 8 CARS DIRECTLY BEHIND TTWX 982843 TO DERAIL. TTWX 982843 RERAILED ITSELF AT THE 39TH STREET CROSSOVER. WC IS AWARE THAT THE IC IS PLANNING TO REPORT THIS DERAILMENT AS HUMAN CAUSED - CODE H506.WE DO NOT AGREE WITH THIS DETERMINATION AND THEY ARE AWA E OF IT.NoneNoneNoneNone
